# Inflation Contract
an inflation contract for the Rigo token.

Name in parity registry: inflation-v2

## Inflation version 0.4.1
```
Mainnet:
Ropsten:
Kovan: 0x94E3d557aD08BB0059663439AA646262104E108D
```
Bytecode
